```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
Judge <- read_csv("Data/judge_batting_2024.csv")
```

```{r}
#Re-orders the data into time increasing instead of time decreasing
Judge1 <- Judge %>%
  group_by(game_date, inning, pitch_number) %>%
  arrange(desc(game_date), .by_group = TRUE)
```
